heading.title: Exams Around the Corner? We've Got You Covered!

hero.description: Master every topic with personalized, Ai-powered guidance and curriculum-aligned practice questions.

profileText.name: Aamir
profileText.description: As a CFA Charterholder with over 10 years of experience tutoring thousands of students at various levels, I’ve had the privilege of witnessing remarkable transformations. I’ve seen students who once struggled in class go on to achieve extraordinary success, often surprising their parents and teachers alike.

sectionTitle.mainHeading: Are you gearing up for your school or board exams?
sectionTitle.subHeading: Need personalized attention that you are not finding outside?

functionalityData.subPara: With Ask Ainstein, you can unlock access to
functionalityData.bottomText: Don’t just memorize! Get the guidance you need to excel in exams and beyond.
